attributes.additional_details: Once again MPs are attacking the most vunerable members in society, that is disabled people who receive DLA instead of making there lives harder than they already are.the government if it needs to save money that has been wasted on illegal wars etc should stop paying winter fuel and cold weather payments to all the britons that move to warmer climates during the winter and those that have incomes that allow them to holiday in barbados etc in the winter.The switch from DLA to PIPs must be delayed untill it has been properly examined by disabled groups who understand disabled peoples needs and the stress this bill is causing the vunerable.
